1. Yes that's a problem. We can't allow arbitrary kwarg arguments (we need an ordering on input Variables, which dicts don't give us), however we can accept them as long as they're not Variables.
2. They serve different purposes. First are tests for Function classes that make sure they're implemented correctly (including grad formulas). Method tests ensure that Variable methods behave exactly like tensor methods (e.g. give the same results, and really modify the input in case of in-place).
